string.name: SERVER_STATUS_DISCONNECTED
string.value: 与服务器的连接已经断开！

string.name: ERR_SYS_NETWORK
string.value: 网络断开(网络通路断开)

string.name: ERR_SYS_SERVERTYPE
string.value: 服务器类型错误, 登录到错误类型的服务器

string.name: ERR_IMS_INVALIDACCOUNT
string.value: 无效的帐户(系统没有该帐户ID)

string.name: ERR_IMS_DUPLICATELOGIN
string.value: 该帐户已经登录, 不得重复登录

string.name: ERR_IMS_REQUESTRELOGIN
string.value: 服务器要求使用获得的新地址重新登录

string.name: ERR_IMS_KICKOUT
string.value: 被踢出(该帐户在其它地方已登录, 强制本地帐号退出)

string.name: ERR_IMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: 服务器功能限制(服务端即时通讯模块授权没有启用)

string.name: ERR_IMS_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: 连接服务器到达最大用户数限制

string.name: ERR_IMS_ACCOUNTLIMIT
string.value: 用户登录到达最大用户帐号数限制

string.name: ERR_IMS_SERVER
string.value: 用户帐号在该服务器上不存在或该服务器没有加载帐号验证模块

string.name: ERR_IMS_SERVERLIMIT
string.value: 服务器地址限定, 该用户不能在此服务器上登录

string.name: ERR_IMS_INVALIDRECORD
string.value: 非录像服务器帐户错误

string.name: ERR_MMS_WORKGROUPLIMITS
string.value: 会议已经超过六人限制

string.name: ERR_MMS_NOMCU
string.value: 会议没有适当的MCU服务器

string.name: ERR_MMS_LOSSAGAIN
string.value: 定损报案号已被其他人登记

string.name: ERR_MMS_LOSSHAVEEND
string.value: 定损报案号已经定损结束

string.name: ERR_MMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: 服务器功能限制(系统会议模块授权没有启用)

string.name: ERR_MMS_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: 系统到达最大会议成员数限制

string.name: ERR_MMS_INVALIDTV
string.value: 非有效的电视墙设备号

string.name: ERR_MMS_HAVETVMATRIX
string.value: 电视墙矩阵设备号已存在

string.name: ERR_MMS_INVALIDTVMATRIX
string.value: 非有效的电视墙矩阵设备号

string.name: ERR_MMS_AUDITORLIMIT
string.value: 会议旁听者最大数量限制

string.name: ERR_SMS_NETWORK
string.value: 连接到短信网关发生网络故障

string.name: ERR_SMS_OTHERS
string.value: 连接到短信网关发生其他故障

string.name: ERR_SMS_ENTRYLIMITS
string.value: 手机号码为空或者超过1000个

string.name: ERR_SMS_SPLITCHAR
string.value: 手机号码分割符号不正确

string.name: ERR_SMS_ERRORNUMBER
string.value: 部分手机号码不正确，已删除，其余手机号码被发送

string.name: ERR_SMS_CONTENTOVERFLOW
string.value: 短信内容为空或超长(70个汉字)

string.name: ERR_SMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: 服务器功能限制(系统短信模块授权没有启用)

string.name: ERR_MON_REUSESERIAL
string.value: 序列号已被其他帐户绑定

string.name: ERR_MON_INVALIDACCOUNT
string.value: 无效的监控设备(或网关)帐户(系统没有该帐户ID)

string.name: ERR_MON_MODULELIMIT
string.value: 服务器功能限制(系统监控模块授权没有启用)

string.name: ERR_MON_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: 系统到达最大通道数限制

string.name: SERVER_STATUS_DISCONNECTED
string.value: The connection to the server has been disconnected!

string.name: ERR_SYS_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_SYS_NETWORK
string.value: Disconnected from the network (network path disconnected)

string.name: ERR_SYS_SERVERTYPE
string.value: Server type error, log on to the server of wrong type

string.name: ERR_IMS_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_IMS_INVALIDACCOUNT
string.value: Invalid account (the system has not this account ID)

string.name: ERR_IMS_DUPLICATELOGIN
string.value: This account already logged in, repeated login is not allowed

string.name: ERR_IMS_REQUESTRELOGIN
string.value: The server requires the re-login by using the new address

string.name: ERR_IMS_KICKOUT
string.value: Was kicked out (this account is logged on elsewhere, forcing the exit of local account)

string.name: ERR_IMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: The server functional limitations (IM module authorization is disabled)

string.name: ERR_IMS_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: Connection server reaches the maximum number limit of users

string.name: ERR_IMS_ACCOUNTLIMIT
string.value: User log-on reaches the maximum number limit of user accounts

string.name: ERR_IMS_SERVER
string.value: The user account does not exist or this server does not load the account authentication module

string.name: ERR_IMS_SERVERLIMIT
string.value: Server address is limited, the user can not log on this server

string.name: ERR_IMS_UNKNOWNAUTHTYPE
string.value: Unknown account authentication mode (NOT: DB / LDAP / RADIUS)

string.name: ERR_MMS_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_MMS_ALREADYLOGIN
string.value: This account has already entered into the conference

string.name: ERR_MMS_WORKGROUPLIMITS
string.value: The conference exceeds the workgroup limit of six

string.name: ERR_MMS_NOMCU
string.value: The conference has no appropriate MCU server

string.name: ERR_MMS_INVALIDROOMTYPE
string.value: Conference room type is not clear

string.name: ERR_MMS_INVALIDMEMBERTYPE
string.value: The registrant type is not clear

string.name: ERR_MMS_LOSSINVALID
string.value: The loss report No. does not exist

string.name: ERR_MMS_LOSSAGAIN
string.value: The loss report No. has been registered by others

string.name: ERR_MMS_LOSSHAVEEND
string.value: The loss report No. has been ended

string.name: ERR_MMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: The server functional limitations (system conference module authorization is disabled)

string.name: ERR_MMS_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: The system reaches the maximum number limit of conference members

string.name: ERR_MMS_HAVETV
string.value: TV wall device NO. already exists

string.name: ERR_MMS_HAVETVMATRIX
string.value: TV wall matrix device No. already exists

string.name: ERR_MMS_INVALIDTVMATRIX
string.value: Invalid TV wall matrix device NO.

string.name: ERR_MMS_AUDITORLIMIT
string.value: The maximum number limit of conference auditors

string.name: ERR_SMS_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_SMS_INVALIDSEARIALNO
string.value: The serial number is empty or invalid

string.name: ERR_SMS_NETWORK
string.value: Network failure of the connection to SMS gateway

string.name: ERR_SMS_OTHERS
string.value: Other failure of the connection to SMS gateway

string.name: ERR_SMS_ENTRYLIMITS
string.value: The cellphone number is empty or over 1000

string.name: ERR_SMS_ERRORNUMBER
string.value: Part of cellphone numbers are incorrect, being removed, and the rest of cellphone numbers are sent

string.name: ERR_SMS_CONTENTOVERFLOW
string.value: The message content is empty or overflow (70 Chinese characters)

string.name: ERR_SMS_MODULELIMIT
string.value: The server functional limitations (system SMS module authorization is disabled)

string.name: ERR_SMS_EMPTYCODE
string.value: Transmission code or receipt code is empty

string.name: ERR_MON_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_MON_REUSESERIAL
string.value: The serial number has been used by other account

string.name: ERR_MON_MODULELIMIT
string.value: The server functional limitation (system monitoring module authorization is disabled)

string.name: ERR_MON_CONNECTLIMIT
string.value: The system reaches the maximum limit of channel numbers

string.name: ERR_NDS_PROTOCOL
string.value: Communication protocol version does not match

string.name: ERR_MMS_UNAVAILABLE
string.value: Do not conform to invite MPS conditions

string.name: ERR_MMS_DUPLICATEMPS
string.value: The same type of MPS already exists
